thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Mologen Resolved Second Capital Increase For Execution Of Share Subscription Facility

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mologen Resolved Second Capital Increase For Execution Of Share Subscription Facility
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Mologen AG:
* DGAP-NEWS: MOLOGEN AG RESOLVED SECOND CAPITAL INCREASE FOR THE EXECUTION OF THE SHARE SUBSCRIPTION FACILITY CONCLUDED IN OCTOBER 2017
* SHARE CAPITAL INCREASED FROM EUR 34.6 MILLION TO EUR 34.8 MILLION THROUGH ISSUANCE OF 200.000 NEW SHARES
* NEW SHARES PRIVATELY PLACED WITH US INVESTOR GCF, AS BEFORE IN COURSE OF FIRST EXERCISE IN DECEMBER 2017
* PRICE IS EUR 2,225 PER NEW SHARE * THROUGH THIS SECOND EXERCISE MOLOGEN RECEIVED GROSS PROCEEDS OF EUR 445,000 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
